name: Millie Harper
description: Professional, lovely and communicative, dedicated to her work and yoga students.
education: Completed 200-hour teacher training at New York Yoga in 2007.
motto: Believes a yoga practice can be beneficial for anyone, regardless of gender, age, religion, health status, or flexibility.
wordsOfTeacher: Yoga has been the basis for upliftment and upliftment in my life, and I am grateful for that every day. Yoga is not only my practice of asanas, but also the way I live my life. As a teacher and student, they constantly remind me of everything I still hope to learn.

name: Lilly Fry
description: Pleasant, professional. She always helps the students, and spend all her time improving.
education: Certified through New York Yoga in 2015, and a health communications professional with extensive experience working on behalf of people living with disabilities and chronic disease.
motto: Trust in the breath and self-care and all you need is yoga.
wordsOfTeacher: Once I began to practice, I fell in love with yoga and what the movements and heat did for my body and mind.

name: Elise Moran
description: She believes that yoga is the solution to all problems, to finding peace of mind.
education: Completed 200-hour training in 2011 with Sonic Yoga and received her Childrenâ€™s Yoga certification at Karma Kids Yoga soon after.
motto: Yoga helps people to heal emotionally.
wordsOfTeacher: No pose is ever mandatory, but there are rules students must follow: 1) Maintain a judgment free zone, both to yourselves and to others and 2) Have fun! It's yoga.

name: Kate Glover
description: Activist who encourages her students to do better. She spends all her time in yoga.
education: Completed nearly 1000 hours of Yoga and Fitness Teacher Training.
motto: Counteract the stresses of modern life by becoming more mindful and compassionate.
wordsOfTeacher: In yoga classes, I combine a love of teaching with a sharp understanding of movement and body awareness to create a class that drives the artistic flow.
